1100010011000010 0110011100111101 1 -> sum: 0010110000000000, cout: 1
0101011000011100 0100000101111110 1 -> sum: 1001011110011011, cout: 0
0110010000000010 0000100001100011 0 -> sum: 0110110001100101, cout: 0

0000011000101101 1010010110000011 0 -> sum: 1010101110110000, cout: 0
1110111101101101 0100100001111011 0 -> sum: 0011011111101000, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
